paragraphs: By no means is anyone to learn that the Veiled Heritance is here in Woodhearth until we are certain that Ayrenn is dead. You are to remain out of sight while our new recruit completes her mission. Your job is only to cover her escape in case she is pursued. If she were exposed, she would be of no more use to us than her sister was.
Once you have assured her escape, you may rejoin the rest of our forces and resume preparations.
